mean_cn: n.礼物（读作/ˈprɛzənt/）；  v.颁发，授予（读作/prɪˈzɛnt/）；  adj.出席的（读作/ˈprɛzənt/）
mean_en: something that you give to someone especially as a way of showing affection or thanks
sentence: The girl gave me a carefully wrapped present.
sentence_trans: 女孩给了我一份精心包装好的礼物。
word_etyma: pres前 + ent名词后缀 → present礼物，赠送物
